name: Paradiso
description: The world has been thrown into chaos and despair after experiments known as "Ritters" spread out from Blanc Kingdom. Wandering around the plagued kingdom, warrior Noir has been assigned with the task of killing Stella, the Queen of Blanc Kingdom, and the "mother" of the Ritters. However, three "blockades" have been created to protect the center of the kingdom, where Stella lies. Ruled by Blood Knight Rouge, Full Moon Aurea, and Garden Lila, whom all have a mysterious connection to the Queen, Noir must advance through them in order to complete his goal.
